originalText.text: Dr. Schultz is very smart, and gentle with patients. The office is quite friendly and everyone makes you feel comfortable!

text.text: Dr. Schultz is very smart, and gentle with patients. The office is quite friendly and everyone makes you feel comfortable!

originalText.text: I have mixed feelings about this office- I came to treat under eye sebaceous glands and I can say he did a great job and he was very kind as well as the staff. I went four times to treat my concerns and I ended up wasting a lot of money & leaving with a different issue that effected my eye. $700 total to laser one broken cap that was missed twice and a sunspot that was also missed during my apt. I ended up emailing and asking for a refund after for only my last visit. I spent a lot and had an incident where the numbing agent affected my eyesight and caused a small area of scar tissue. I felt they were conservative and careful overall but two treatments where you miss the area of concern by eyeballing it at that price is just disheartening and kind of unacceptable. Both times of these times when I left I could see it was red almost right next to the spot I asked to be treated and not the actual spot, which is why there was no overall result.

originalText.text: I recently saw Emily in the office with concerns about my jawline. She took the time to explain the different effects Botox and Fillers could have and the best way to proceed. Her techniques were innovative and current and gave me better results than I have seen in the five years I have been using Botox. I am bringing my friends back with me at the end of the month for a Botox extravaganza!

originalText.text: I have been going to Dr Schultz’s practice for over 15 years. The staff are always friendly and make me feel very welcome. The medical and cosmetic care I get here are at the highest level. I have sent many friends and my daughter to Park Avenue Skin Care and all have returned.  I spent many years in AZ and Southern Ca  and took in a lot of sun. Working with Dr Schultz appears to have successfully reversed all of that damage. He is an excellent doctor.

originalText.text: I have seen Dr. Schultz and the Park Avenue Skin Care team for years and they are all amazing! The staff is great, so friendly and welcoming. Dr. Schultz is an excellent doctor who has been wonderful with my general skin care needs as well as cosmetic treatments. He is very thorough and attentive. I also love his BeautyRx products and peels! I highly recommend him!
